advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Goldstar is an event discovery app with the most half-price tickets to live entertainment in the world. Use it to experience more and spend less on the hottest concerts, theater, nightlife, comedy, sports & events in your city. 

Never miss out on the best of what's happening near you or in any of our 27 cities. See how quick and easy it is to find, plan, buy and go with Goldstar.


FEATURES: 
• New events added daily.
• Easy and secure checkout.
• Exclusive discounts & complimentary tickets.
• Passbook compatible.
• Personalized event recommendations. 
• Save favorite events, venues and categories to hear when new shows and tickets become available.
• Reviews, directions and helpful tips from fans that have already gone. 
• We list events for Live Nation/Ticketmaster, MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL, Major League Soccer, Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey, Cirque du Soliel, Broadway, Disney On Ice and more.
• Ticket integrations with Ticketmaster, Broadway Inbound, Cirque du Soliel & Tickets.com. 
• 100% free to find something great to do.


REVIEWS:
"In two minutes or less, I was DONE buying my tickets, and they were stored in my passbook. LOVE IT!" -LouiseLovesApps

"This is the best app for theater and event discounts! I have found out about shows I would have never heard of. Great experience!" -Jboberg1102

"Not only gives you good prices on some hidden gems in city theater but also gives you reviews of plays as well. Easy to use." -Andrea1865

"Great app - perfect for date night or last minute 'let's do something' ideas." -BG Papa

"First time using was easy. I starred the program I wanted and was alerted when new dates appeared." -Cowgirl Rose 

“I love my new app! It makes a family with one income still enjoy entertainment for a reasonable price... We have used it for hockey games, plays, Disney on Ice …” -J Stenson


PRESS: 
"The low ticket prices and plentiful consumer ratings of the shows are evidently creating a generation of live-entertainment junkies." -Reuters 

"Goldstar offers a wide variety of entertainment." -New York Times

“Goldstar Events has a deal for seemingly every interest… from prestigious theaters to Mega Stadiums.” -Sky West Magazine

" …the scoop on cut-rate tickets to sporting events, concerts, comedy acts, museum
exhibits, and more." -Consumer Reports

"Goldstar is a goldmine for theater & entertainment."-Star Tribune

CONNECT:

Contact Us - help@goldstar.com

trackName: Goldstar: Half-price Tickets to Live Entertainment – Discount Concerts, Theater, Sports, Nightlife & More Events
releaseNotes:
Now the Goldstar app can follow along with you as you travel! This update gives you the option to see event listings based on your current location, wherever you may be. We've also included a bunch of small tweaks to help make the app even faster and easier to use. 

Thanks for using Goldstar! Please contact help@goldstar.com or @goldstar on Twitter for help or suggestions.
